mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 14, 2022:

* Arrival in Washington

After arriving in Washington, take some time to relax and settle into your accommodation. Consider staying at a hotel or vacation rental that offers non-shared rooms and welcomes visitors. For dinner, explore local Chinese food options.

Day 2 - March 15, 2022:

* Explore Washington (Breakfast: Mexican; Lunch: American; Dinner: Italian)

Begin your day with a delicious Mexican breakfast at one of the city's popular taquerias or cafes. Next, visit some of Washington's iconic landmarks and attractions, such as the Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History, the U.S. Capitol Building, or the Lincoln Memorial. For lunch, try a local American diner or burger joint.

In the afternoon, continue your sightseeing before treating yourself to an authentic Italian dinner at one of Washington's top-rated Italian restaurants. After dinner, consider taking a leisurely stroll around the city or visiting a local bar or lounge for drinks and live music.

Day 3 - March 16, 2022:

* Flight from Washington to Los Angeles (Breakfast: Continental; Lunch: In-flight)

After checking out of your accommodation in Washington, head to the airport for your flight to Los Angeles. Choose a non-stop flight with a reasonable price within your budget. Enjoy a light continental breakfast before boarding and have lunch onboard during your flight. Once you arrive in Los Angeles, take a taxi or self-drive from the airport to your accommodation in the city.

* Arrival in Los Angeles (Dinner: Chinese)

Upon arriving in Los Angeles, check into your hotel or vacation rental and then head out for dinner at one of the city's highly-rated Chinese restaurants. After dinner, take some time to explore the neighborhood or relax in your accommodation.

Day 4 - March 17, 2022:

* Explore Los Angeles (Breakfast: American; Lunch: Mexican; Dinner: Italian)

Start your day with an American-style breakfast at a local café or diner. Next, visit some of Los Angeles's top attractions, such as the Getty Center, Griffith Observatory, or Universal Studios Hollywood. For lunch, try a local Mexican restaurant or taqueria.

In the afternoon, continue your sightseeing before treating yourself to an authentic Italian dinner at one of Los Angeles's top-rated Italian restaurants. After dinner, consider taking a leisurely stroll around the city or visiting a local bar or lounge for drinks and live music.

Day 5 - March 18, 2022:

* Flight from Los Angeles to Washington (Breakfast: In-flight; Lunch: In-flight)

After checking out of your accommodation in Los Angeles, head to the airport for your flight back to Washington. Choose a non-stop flight with a reasonable price within your budget. Have breakfast onboard during your flight and enjoy lunch onboard during your return trip.

* Arrival in Washington

Upon arriving in Washington, take a taxi or self-drive from the airport to your accommodation in the city. Once you're settled in, spend the rest of the day relaxing and exploring local attractions. Consider visiting a nearby park or garden for a leisurely walk, trying a new cuisine, or simply enjoying some downtime before returning home.

Estimated Cost Breakdown:

* Accommodations (3 nights in Washington, 1 night in Los Angeles): $800
* Meals (2 people x 5 days x $100 per day): $1,000
* Flights (Washington to Los Angeles, Los Angeles to Washington): $1,600
* Ground Transportation (Taxis, Rental Car, etc.): $300
* Activities and Attractions: $900

Total Estimated Cost: $4,600
